title: Nagumo Song Lyrics Arunachalam
stanzas:
Nagumo yei sugamo
vetkam vidumo
muththam podum podhu
moodum ilankodi.

Nagumo yei sugamo
vetkam thagumo
muththam podum podhu
aadumm ilankodi.

Nagumo yei sugamo
vetkam vidumo
muththam podum podhu
moodum ilankodi.
nagumo....

vellik kolusugal oasai oasi ida
velli kizhamaiyil aasai aasai vara
mutham tharugaiyil
meesa meesa andhu mogam
thoondi viduthe..

uchchanthaliyila ennai enni kondu
ullangalvarai pinni pinni kondu
mutham tharugaiyil mogamaana
kili udhattai kadichi vittathe.

nesamaa, nesanthaan
kaayamaa paarammaa
re re ga pa ba ga
re re ga pa ba ga
ga re sa re sa ni
sa ni tha pa sa re.

Nagumo yei sugamo
vetkam vidumo
muththam podum podhu
aadumm ilankodi.
nagumo..

Alli malarvadhu
ivaru nerathula
malli malarvadhu
maalai nerathula
penmai malarvadhu
endha nerathula engu
kandu pudicha..

kattai viral kondu
kolam podugaiyil
kannin kadai vizhi
saaindhu moodugaiyil
kaalin kolusugal
thaalam maarugaiyil
penmai malarndhu nirkkume.

sariyaa sarithaa
parisu idhuthaan.
re re ga pa ba ga
re re ga pa ba ga
ga re sa re sa ni
sa ni tha pa sa re.

Nagumo yei sugamo
vetkam vidumo
muththam podum podhu
moodum ilankodi.

Nagumo yei sugamo
vetkam thagumo
muththam podum podhu
aadumm ilankodi.
